description: Kitamoto Atsushi is a classmate of Natsume, and best friend to Nishimura Satoru. He is a sensible and rational person. Although Natsume initially rejects Atsushi`s overtures of friendship because of his fears of his ability being found out, he eventually becomes friends with Atsushi and Satoru, although they still hang around more with each other than Natsume.
name: Kitamoto Atsushi
